ingredients.content: 7 oz dark chocolate, min. 50% cocoa, cut into pieces

preparations.content: Place sugar into mixing bowl and grind <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add dark chocolate and whipping cream and melt <b>4 min/120°F/speed 2<b>.
Add egg yolks and mix <b>15 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer mixture to a medium size bowl and set aside. Clean and dry mixing bowl thoroughly.

<b>Insert butterfly whisk.<b> Place egg whites and salt into mixing bowl and whisk <b>3 min/speed 3.5<b> or until stiff. <b>Remove butterfly whisk<b>, transfer whisked egg whites into reserved chocolate mixture and carefully fold in with spatula. Pour into 6 individual dessert bowls and refrigerate for at least 3 hours before serving.
